title: That one champion you KNOW isn't broken but you FEEL like they're broken
body:
...every time you face them.

For me, it's {{champion:68}}.  I'm sure I could be straight-up schooled on how balanced he is, but personally, it feels like he's obnoxious and oppressive every time I face him!  
...But that's just me, I guess.

Who is it for you?
